data.title: Micropolis AI Robotics (NYSE: MCRP) inks Saudi LOI, eyes up to 500 robots over two years
data.description: Micropolis AI Robotics signs a Saudi LOI with QSS Robotics, planning pilots with the Ministry of Interior and ARAMCO starting December 20, 2025.
data.author: Stock Titan
data.keywords: Micropolis AI Robotics, MCRP, QSS Robotics, letter of intent, LOI, Saudi Arabia, autonomous robots, AI security, pilot project, Ministry of Interior, ARAMCO, distribution agreement, technology localization, 2025
